Zurück zur Bücherliste Ester Wier Versionen von The Loner

Titel: The Loner

Autor: Ester Wier

ISBN-13: 9780590443524

Sprache: English

Beschreibung: The boy with no name doesn't remember his past; all he knows is that he has to survive, and that means picking fruit on various farms across the southwest. Staying with anyone who'll take him, he gives up all his wages for food and a place to sleep. Then he finds a loving home and realizes he is no longer a loner.
